icebreakers.prompt: Tony, I noticed you're working at crewAI focusing on AI agents. What do you find most exciting about the current developments in AI software?
Having attended the University of Pennsylvania, what were some experiences or courses that significantly shaped your career in AI?
You seem deeply engaged with AI advancements and marketing strategies on LinkedIn. What are some intriguing trends you're observing in the AI industry today?
As a member of organizations like Black in AI and NSBE, how have these memberships influenced your professional journey and perspective on leadership?
Your volunteer work with the Rare Cancer Research Program is quite impressive. What motivated you to get involved in this cause, and what insights have you gained from it?
